arts.ttl: Monza vs. Como, precious points up for grabs
arts.sum: Monza have avoided defeat in three of their five home games played in the second leg this season (W1 D2), as many times as in the entire first leg (D3 L7); however, in the last four Serie A home matches they have scored just one goal (Armando Izzo vs Parma). Como have won one of their last 11 away matches in Serie A – three draws and seven defeats – the only success in the period was against Fiorentina on 16 February 2025 (2-0), in the only one of these games in which they kept a clean sheet.

Monza go into this round off a 3-0 defeat to Cagliari, as they collapsed in the second half after a positive start in the opening 45 minutes. Como share points with Empoli in a lively 1-1 draw that f...
Napoli are hoping to close the gap to league leaders Inter Milan at the top of the Serie A standings and Aaron Rogan has predictions for all 10 games in Italy's top-flight this weekend.

arts.ttl: Preview: Monza vs. Como - prediction, team news, lineups
arts.sum: Sports Mole previews Saturday's Serie A clash between Monza and Como, including predictions, team news and possible lineups.
